reviews.review: Do we ever get a Portal 3?
"Connect your portal to the thing! No the other thing! No the other portal!"

Tanto a campanha single player quanto co-op conseguem ser divertidas do come√ßo ao fim. O jogo pega tudo que existe de bom no primeiro jogo e reproduz com maestria.

It was a triumph...
Very good game, totally fun to play especially with a friend in Co-op. 10/10 worth every single penny.

I can still hear the screaming from 4-2 co-op.
10/10.
puzzles are duifficult and fun, an absolute classic must have
Game that introduced me to gaming, With that one of my favorites, countless hours on my ps3
Funny Yes, Made me feel bad about my self cuz glados is a bitch yeah, the co-op is good,..... i havent played it cuz i got no friends, over all 999999999999/10 cuz of the radio music
Creative, hilarious, and genuinely fun to play. One of my favorite games of all time. First through on PS3, now going back through again.
me termino de gustar cuando vi que puedes hacer tus propios mapas y puzzles uvu
GLaD0S is just too good at insulting me

Great fing game
great story honestly one of the best stories and the comedy is still top notch and if you have a low IQ like me have fun getting frustrated because i sure did but i got through it all
10/10
Can't call yourself a true gamer if you haven't played this game

if you have not already GET THIS GAME it is the best game ive played in a long time its so worth the 10 dollars it costs i woul price it more at 25 or 30 dollars it has funny times happy times sad times and over all its just a good game
This game is really fun and good! If you like puzzle games this is game I highly recommand to buy this game!
One of the best games ever made... period
Puzzles, Story, and Humor are all really good. Puzzles get progressively harder as the game progresses.

This game is a must have!
You should first play the singleplayer and then the multiplayer with a friend.

There are also many community maps and a map editor.
Great single player game, but much better in Coop!

This game was recommended by one of my friends, and while I don't own a controller I enjoy it. The story is better than the first game and the levels are difficult, but as of yet there haven't been any that feel outright impossible.
Fun game, lots of puzzles to go through, very challenging at times.
Kann man nur empfehlen, ist auch in 2021 noch sein Geld wert

This game is perfect except for one thing. There is a loading screen after almost every chamber.

9.99/10

Typically, I stay away from puzzle type games because they make my head hurt but Glados makes the Portal games so entertaining even when you want to pull your hair out trying to figure out how to advance.
This is the best game ever!
it is already a classic... good one.
trolling ur friends in co-op is fun

One of the best games ever made.
game is great, came twice while playing

Portal 2 is a story driven puzzle game, if you like jokes and fun then this is the game for you. Its a short but sweet game and i would recommend this if you want to have some fun with a friend in multiplayer or on your own in singleplayer. i personally love this game for its story and fun puzzles along with the dialogue.


8/10
Make a list of the greatest games ever made. Then rank that list. Then, put Portal 2 at or near the very top of that ranked list. It's just that good.
